root: ^ISABELLE: The path forward isn’t always super obvious. Sometimes, it might look like the way is blocked.

PERSPECTIVE: ^ISABELLE: All you have to do is get a change of perspective. Retrace your steps, look at it from a different angle, and make a choice based on what you see.
TIME: ^ISABELLE: All you have to do is take your time. Don’t rush into things without considering all your options. The path will reveal itself to you eventually.
